titles.title: A resolution designating August 7, 2013, as "National Lighthouse and Lighthouse Preservation Day".
A resolution designating August 7, 2013, as "National Lighthouse and Lighthouse Preservation Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Designates August 7, 2013, as National Lighthouse and Lighthouse Preservation Day.
Encourages lighthouse grounds to be made open to the general public to the extent feasible.
Encourages the U.S. people to observe the day with appropriate ceremonies and activities.
